Address.label: Address
Address.value: 1 SKYVIEW DRIVE, FORT WORTH, Texas, 76155, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: American Airlines is the world's largest airline by scheduled revenue passenger miles. The firm's major U.S. hubs are Charlotte, Chicago, Dallas/Fort Worth, Los Angeles, Miami, New York, Philadelphia, Phoenix, and Washington, D.C. After completing a major fleet renewal, the company has the youngest fleet of U.S. legacy carriers.

value.name: David G. Seymour
value.title: Chief Operating Officer & Senior Vice President
